com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.model

Interface Query<T extends QueryModel>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type that the query holds (instance of QueryModel.
    All Superinterfaces:
    QueryModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QueryImpl

    public interface Query<T extends QueryModel>
extends QueryModel
    The Query interface represents a data query and is a type of QueryModel. This query can be applied to a DAO.

    • Method Detail

      • getQueryType

        QueryLogicalConjunction getQueryType()
        Get the type of query.
        Returns:
        The type of query to set.

      • setQueryType

        void setQueryType(QueryLogicalConjunction newQueryType)
        Set the type of query.
        Parameters:
        newQueryType - The type of query to set.

      • isNot

        boolean isNot()
        Is this a negated query (logically inverted operation).
        Returns:
        boolean - True indicates that this is a not operation.

      • setNot

        void setNot(boolean newNot)
        Set whether this is a negated operation.
        Parameters:
        newNot - Indicating a negated operation (true = NOT);

      • getQuery

        java.util.List<T> getQuery()
        Get the list of query items. The list of query items combined with the type comprise the query.
        Returns:
        List A list of all query items that comprise this query.

      • setQuery

        void setQuery(java.util.List<T> newQuery)
        Set the list of query items. The list of query items combined with the type comprise the query.
        Parameters:
        newQuery - A list of query items that comprise this query.

      • addQuery

        void addQuery(T newItem)
        Add a query item to the query.
        Parameters:
        newItem - The item to be added to the query.

      • removeQuery

        void removeQuery(T oldItem)
        Remove a query item to the query.
        Parameters:
        oldItem - The item to be removed from the query.
